name: CyberCop_Plus.exe
description:
CyberCop Plus is a slick retro-futuristic, '80s inspired arcade game that will make your brain melt. You've been warned. Lurk deep into your operating system and destroy all the viruses.

In this brave new world digital world, only the strong survive.

Don't become cyber-debris!!

Order CyberCop Plus today!

Operators are standing by.

//Term project for Msc Creative Digital Media, 2017
